ISSUE.TITLE: Omnisend plugin settings not initialized
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: develop Steps to reproduce the problem: http://localhost:15536/en/if-you-wait-donation InvalidOperationException: Nullable object must have a value. ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5b51721b-05c3-4bb5-980a-48b3ec38b9bb)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7414 Omnisend. Prevented possible problems with null references on the price model
